name: Whole Wheat Banana Bread with Flaxseed and Oats
author: MARYFLOWERS
summary: Banana bread without the guilt... This bread is hard to beat because it is very flavorful and full of the good stuff. No white flour, only wheat, flaxseed meal, and oats mixed with buttermilk and eggs, making for a healthy start or snack during the day.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix whole wheat flour, brown sugar, flaxseed meal, oats, white sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl
Combine eggs, butter, 1/3 cup plus 1 tablespoon butter milk, and vanilla extract in another bowl
Add bananas; mix until batter is well-combined
Pour into the prepared loaf pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 50 minutes to 1 hour
Cool in the pan for 5 minutes
Invert onto a wire rack and let cool, about 25 minutes
